channel.title: Little Help On Commands/Starter Outfit Please
channel.description:
Whats the ::givemod command for co-owner+ And the ::giveadmin command for co-owner+?
I forgot how to change the Starter Outfit can anyone tell me how?
Please Send Replies!

item.title: Little Help On Commands/Starter Outfit Please
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Moderator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Little Help On Commands/Starter Outfit Please

item.title: Little Help On Commands/Starter Outfit Please
item.dc:creator: @bboyliu bboyliu
item.description:
@bboyliu wrote:

Acialy do Ctrl+F and type in Giving the player an unique look You will see,
playerEquipment[playerHat]=0;
playerEquipment[playerCape]=0;
playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=0;
playerEquipment[playerChest]=0;
playerEquipment[playerShield]=0;
playerEquipment[playerLegs]=0;
playerEquipment[playerHands]=0;
playerEquipment[playerFeet]=0;
playerEquipment[playerRing]=-0;
playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-0;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=0;
Then change the 0s or whatever number there is to the ID of the item you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Little Help On Commands/Starter Outfit Please

item.title: Little Help On Commands/Starter Outfit Please
item.dc:creator: @kiamyhelp kiamyhelp
item.description:
@kiamyhelp wrote:

to change the starting outfit go to the player java and find where it says “give you player a unique look”

then below that it will say like the head, chest, ammy, legs, gloves, ect

next to each of those is item number.

just find the stuff u want for the starter and put the right id number with the right spot.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2008, 06:59:18 PM[/size][hr]also for the commands… u just need to look through all your commands…

for my server wat u do is ::makemem(name) with no space and it will say wrong syntax use ::make ######

or something like that.

Read full topic
item.source: Little Help On Commands/Starter Outfit Please
